Reviews.Title: Unfortunate Situtation - Satisfied with the Result
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought the Sprint iPhone 5 32G... Once it was received and we went to activate the phone, it was listed as lost or stolen. We could not activate the phone and had to return. The process was fairly pain free - we had our money back within 1.5 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great but Could've Been Better.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Chaffen
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I did not receive my full order. The phone came in phenomenal condition, but it did not come with the black silicone case that it was originally supposed to have come with. That's why I did not give a full five stars.

Reviews.Title: IPHONE 5
Reviews.Author: RONALD MESINA
Reviews.Content: I AM VERY SATISFIED WITH THE UNIT EVEN THOUGH IT IS LOCKED, THE SERVICE IS GOOD AND FAST. I'M LOOKING FORWARD TO RECEIVE MORE OFFERS FROM THIS SUPPLIER

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: a flin
Reviews.Content: It’s really hard to write a review for this seller because everything was perfect. The description of the product was 100 percent accurate. I took the phone to my local Sprint store and they activated it without any problems. I’ve been using it for the last couple of days and there have not been any problems. I am completely satisfied with this transaction. When I need another phone I will definitely look to this seller.
